basics.name: Abhinav Thorat
basics.label: Research Scientist
basics.summary: Experienced machine learning researcher with a passion for astrophysics, boasting a diverse range of interests including coding, psychology, and philosophy. Demonstrated proficiency through years of work in multinational corporations, reflecting a commitment to continuous learning and interdisciplinary expertise.

work.name: Sony Research, India
work.summary: Working as a researcher in the domain of Machine learning and causal inference.
